QuestData.Title: Favor Amongst the Darkspear
QuestData.Description: <Najak snarls.>$B$BBefore the night elves existed there was troll. It was from troll that the night elves came.$B$BTheir mutinous attacks against my people will not be tolerated. Staghelm seeks to wipe us out - to leave no trace of those that bore him and his ilk. It will not happen!$B$BFor every night elf that you slay and decapitate, Najak will grant you favor amongst the Darkspear. Word of your deeds will be spread across Kalimdor and the Eastern Kingdoms. Go now and serve the Darkspear!
QuestData.LogDescription: You have been tasked with slaying opposing night elf players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a night elf and return to Najak Hexxen at Frostwolf Keep with a Severed Night Elf Head.
QuestData.CompletionText: They seek to exterminate us? It is they who shall be exterminated.
QuestData.RewardText: $N, it is but one of thousands. A job well done nonetheless.
